pywind.decc module¶

The decc module contains classes to access the information provided by the DECC.

class pywind.decc.MonthlyExtract[source]¶

The MonthlyExtract class allows the current monthly data to be easily retrieved and parsed.

get_data()[source]¶

Get the data from the DECC server and parse it into DECC records.

class pywind.decc.DeccRecord(row, fields)[source]¶

Simple class to hold details of one DECC station.

pywind.bmreports module¶

Module to access information available via the BMReports website.

class pywind.bmreports.UnitData(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Class that gets data about Balancing Mechanism Units from the Balancing Mechanism website.

set_type(typ)[source]¶

Will throw an error if an invalid type is used...

class pywind.bmreports.UnitList[source]¶

Get a list of the Balancing Mechanism Units with their Fuel Type and dates.

class pywind.bmreports.PowerPackUnits[source]¶

Download the latest Power Pack modules spreadsheet and make the list of stations available as a list.

pywind.ofgem module¶

pywind.roc module¶

Prices from the eROC website from their regular ROC auctions.

class pywind.roc.EROCPrices[source]¶

Class that allows access to eROC ROC auction prices.

get_prices()[source]¶

Get the recent prices.

pywind.utils¶

Utility functions used by more than module within pywind.

pywind.utils.get_or_post_a_url(url, post=False, **kwargs)[source]¶

Use the requests library to either get or post to a specified URL. The return code is checked and exceptions raised if there has been a redirect or the status code is not 200.

Args:
url: The URL to be used. post: True if the request should be a POST. Default is False which results in a GET request. kwargs: Optional keyword arguments that are passed directly to the requests call.
Returns:
The requests object is returned if all checks pass.
Raises:
Raises Exception for various errors.
